title: Reaching out: the library and the exceptional child
creator_credit: Hilda Limper, William D Stoneback, Joanna Foster and Connecticut Films
brief_description: Shows library services operated for children who are deaf, blind, hospitalised, physically handicapped, mentally handicapped, and socially maladjusted, in Cincinnati, Ohio
